categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order organizations

nodes.text: SAGEducation was a division of the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order's Sub-Adult Group. It was responsible for providing education to billions of young beings across the galaxy, many on planets which suffered during the break up of the Galactic Republic. SAGEducation's successes were the source of a lot of COMPNOR's positive reputation. Dedicated and well-organized, the members of SAGEducation were firm adherents to the New Order and believed in its future, and that by educating the young of the galaxy they would create better galactic citizens. This view caused confrontation with the Imperial Security Bureau, which was a source of surprise among the members of SAGEducation.
